com.apw.Steering

Class SteeringMk2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apw.Steering.SteeringBase
      • com.apw.Steering.SteeringMk2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Steerable

    public class SteeringMk2
extends SteeringBase

    Version 2 of steering. This version improves center detection by adding the ability to follow a single lane. This makes crashing much rarer, as well as better navigating tight corners.

    Author:
    kevin, carl, nathan
